attributes.additional_details:
Healthcare is a basic human right and should be free (based on tax payer’s contributions) in all European countries.
All people should have access to good free healthcare and we should be pushing for this in EU to be implemented within the next few years or receive incredibly heavy fines by non compliant countries.
We would like to see our European ministers present and push for this in all EU member states - preferably to get this passed as law
